00029     template<typename Type>
00030     class Vec3
00031     {
00032     public:
00034         Vec3()
00035         {
00036             setValue(0, 0, 0);
00037         }
00038 
00040         Vec3(const Type v[3])
00041         {
00042             setValue(v);
00043         }
00044 
00046         Vec3(Type a_x, Type a_y, Type a_z)
00047         {
00048             setValue(a_x, a_y, a_z);
00049         }
00050 
00052         Vec3(const Vec3<Type> & a_vec)
00053         {
00054             setValue(a_vec[0], a_vec[1], a_vec[2]);
00055         }
00056 
00058         virtual ~Vec3(){}
00059 
00061         Vec3<Type> & setValue(const Type v[3])
00062         {
00063             m_xyz[0] = v[0];
00064             m_xyz[1] = v[1];
00065             m_xyz[2] = v[2];
00066 
00067             return *this;
00068         }
00069 
00071         Vec3<Type> & setValue(Type a_x, Type a_y, Type a_z)
00072         {
00073             m_xyz[0] = a_x;
00074             m_xyz[1] = a_y;
00075             m_xyz[2] = a_z;
00076 
00077             return *this;
00078         }
00079 
00081         const Type * getValue() const
00082         {
00083             return &m_xyz[0];
00084         }
00085 
00087         Type dot(const Vec3<Type> & a_vec) const
00088         {
00089             return (m_xyz[0]*a_vec[0] + m_xyz[1]*a_vec[1] + m_xyz[2]*a_vec[2]);
00090         }
00091 
00093         Type length() const
00094         {
00095             return (Type)std::sqrt( sqrLength() );
00096         }
00097 
00099         Type sqrLength() const
00100         {
00101             return (m_xyz[0]*m_xyz[0])+(m_xyz[1]*m_xyz[1])+(m_xyz[2]*m_xyz[2]);
00102         }
00103 
00105         Type normalize()
00106         {
00107             Type magnitude = length();
00108 
00109             if(magnitude != 0.0)
00110                 (*this) *= (Type)(1.0 / magnitude);
00111             else setValue(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00112 
00113             return magnitude;
00114         }
00115 
00117         Vec3<Type> cross(const Vec3<Type> & a_vec) const
00118         {
00119             return Vec3<Type>(m_xyz[1] * a_vec[2] - a_vec[1] * m_xyz[2],
00120                               m_xyz[2] * a_vec[0] - a_vec[2] * m_xyz[0],
00121                               m_xyz[0] * a_vec[1] - a_vec[0] * m_xyz[1]);
00122         }
00123 
00125         void negate()
00126         {
00127             setValue(-m_xyz[0], -m_xyz[1], -m_xyz[2]);
00128         }
00129 
00131         Type & x(){  return m_xyz[0]; }
00132 
00134         Type & y(){  return m_xyz[1]; }
00135 
00137         Type & z(){  return m_xyz[2]; }
00138 
00140         const Type & x()const{  return m_xyz[0]; }
00141 
00143         const Type & y()const{  return m_xyz[1]; }
00144 
00146         const Type & z()const{  return m_xyz[2]; }
00147 
00149         Type &  operator[](int i) { return m_xyz[i]; }
00150 
00152         const Type & operator[](int i) const { return m_xyz[i]; }
00153

00156         {
00157             m_xyz[0] *= d;
00158             m_xyz[1] *= d;
00159             m_xyz[2] *= d;
00160 
00161             return *this;
00162         }

00166         {
00167             *this *= (1.0f/d);
00168 
00169             return *this;
00170         }

00173         Vec3<Type> & operator *=(const Vec3<Type> & a_vec)
00174         {
00175             m_xyz[0] *= a_vec.m_xyz[0];
00176             m_xyz[1] *= a_vec.m_xyz[1];
00177             m_xyz[2] *= a_vec.m_xyz[2];
00178 
00179             return *this;

00186             m_xyz[1] += a_vec.m_xyz[1];
00187             m_xyz[2] += a_vec.m_xyz[2];
00188 
00189             return *this;

00193         Vec3<Type> & operator -=(const Vec3<Type> & a_vec)
00194         {
00195             m_xyz[0] -= a_vec.m_xyz[0];
00196             m_xyz[1] -= a_vec.m_xyz[1];
00197             m_xyz[2] -= a_vec.m_xyz[2];
00198 
00199             return *this;
00200         }
00201 
00203         Vec3<Type> operator-() const
00204         {
00205             return Vec3<Type>(-m_xyz[0], -m_xyz[1], -m_xyz[2]);
00206         }

00208         friend Vec3<Type> operator *(const Vec3<Type> & a_vec, const Type d)
00209         { 
00210             return Vec3<Type>(a_vec.m_xyz[0] * d, a_vec.m_xyz[1] * d, a_vec.m_xyz[2] * d);
00211         }
00212 
00213         friend Vec3<Type> operator *(const Type d, const Vec3<Type> & a_vec)
00214         { 
00215             return a_vec * d; 
00216         }
00217 
00218         friend Vec3<Type> operator /(const Vec3<Type> & a_vec, const Type d)
00219         { 
00220             return Vec3<Type>(a_vec.m_xyz[0] / d, a_vec.m_xyz[1] / d, a_vec.m_xyz[2] / d);
00221         }
00222 
00223         friend Vec3<Type> operator *(const Vec3<Type> & v1, const Vec3<Type> & v2)
00224         {       
00225             return Vec3<Type>(v1.m_xyz[0] * v2.m_xyz[0],v1.m_xyz[1] * v2.m_xyz[1],v1.m_xyz[2] * v2.m_xyz[2]);
00226         }
00227 
00228         friend Vec3<Type> operator +(const Vec3<Type> & v1, const Vec3<Type> & v2)
00229         {       
00230             return Vec3<Type>(v1.m_xyz[0] + v2.m_xyz[0],v1.m_xyz[1] + v2.m_xyz[1],v1.m_xyz[2] + v2.m_xyz[2]);
00231         }
00232 
00233         friend Vec3<Type> operator -(const Vec3<Type> & v1, const Vec3<Type> & v2)
00234         {       
00235             return Vec3<Type>(v1.m_xyz[0] - v2.m_xyz[0],v1.m_xyz[1] - v2.m_xyz[1],v1.m_xyz[2] - v2.m_xyz[2]);   
00236         }
00237 
00239         friend bool operator ==(const Vec3<Type> & v1, const Vec3<Type> & v2)
00240         { 
00241             return (v1.m_xyz[0]==v2.m_xyz[0] && v1.m_xyz[1]==v2.m_xyz[1] && v1.m_xyz[2]==v2.m_xyz[2]); 
00242         }
00243 
00245         friend bool operator !=(const Vec3<Type> & v1, const Vec3<Type> & v2)
00246         { 
00247             return !(v1 == v2); 
00248         }
00249 
00251         bool equals(const Vec3<Type> & a_vec, const Type a_tolerance=1E-2) const
00252         {
00253             return ( (m_xyz - a_vec).sqrLength() <= a_tolerance*a_tolerance );
00254         }
00255 
00256         friend std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & os, const Vec3<Type> & vect)
00257         { 
00258             return os << vect.x() << " " << vect.y() << " " << vect.z(); 
00259         }
00260 
00262         static Vec3<Type> max()
00263         {
00264             return Vec3<Type>(std::numeric_limits<Type>::max(), 
00265                               std::numeric_limits<Type>::max(),
00266                               std::numeric_limits<Type>::max());
00267         }
00268     private:
00269         Type m_xyz[3];
00270     };
